alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Central La Paz; Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 12:29PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central La Paz, northeastern Yuma and Maricopa Counties through 115 PM MST... At 1229 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles southeast of Vicksburg Junction to 17 miles west of Sundad to 12 miles northwest of Paloma to near Tacna. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wellton, Tacna, Paloma, Tyson, Sundad, Roll and Hyder. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 58 and 92. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 31 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aguila Valley; Central La Paz; Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Tonopah Desert
